code: /* selectors */ /* action name creator */var reducerName='orders';var createActionName=function createActionName(name){return"app/".concat(reducerName,"/").concat(name);};/* action types */var ADD_ORDER=createActionName('ADD_ORDER');/* action creators */export var addOrder=function addOrder(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ADD_ORDER};};/* thunk creators */ /* reducer */export var reducer=function reducer(){var statePart=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};switch(action.type){case ADD_ORDER:{var newOrder=action.payload;statePart.push(newOrder);return statePart;}default:return statePart;}};
